Class SString

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.utils.SString
public class SString extends Object
String convenience methods.
Author:
Michael Darter, Douglas Lau

  • Method Details

    • byteArrayToString

      public static String byteArrayToString(byte[] b)
      Convert byte[] to char[] using specific encoding.
      Returns:
      An empty string on error.

    • byteArrayToString

      public static String byteArrayToString(byte[] b, int len)
      Convert byte[] to char[] using specific encoding.
      Returns:
      An empty string on error.

    • enclosedBy

      public static boolean enclosedBy(String s, String e)
      Return true if the specified string is enclosed by another string

    • intToString

      public static String intToString(int i, int numdigs)
      Convert an int to string with the specified number of digits, prefixing with zeros as necessary. e.g. (4,2) returns '04', (666,2) returns 666.

    • truncate

      public static String truncate(String arg, int maxlen)
      Truncate a string to a given maximum length.
      Parameters:
      arg - String to be truncated.
      maxlen - Maximum length of string (characters).
      Returns:
      Truncated string.

    • stringToInt

      public static int stringToInt(String s)
      Convert string to int. This method suppresses all number format exceptions, returning 0 if a NumberFormatException is caught.

    • stringToLong

      public static long stringToLong(String s)
      Convert string to long. This method suppresses all number format exceptions, returning 0 if a NumberFormatException is caught.

      Convert string to double

    • containsIgnoreCase

      public static boolean containsIgnoreCase(String arg1, String arg2)
      Does a string contain another string?
      Returns:
      true if string1 contains string2, case insensitive.

    • toString

      public static String toString(String[] s)
      Convert String[] to a comma separated String. Null values are not added to the list, empty strings are.

    • toString

      public static String toString(int[] i)
      Return a comma separated list given an int array.

      Find the longest common substring of two strings

      public static boolean isDisplayable(String s)
      Check if all characters in a string are displayable

    • splitCamel

      public static String splitCamel(String s)
      Split a camel-case string into words.
      Parameters:
      s - String in camel case, e.g. 'blaBlaBla' or null.
      Returns:
      Space separated words, e.g. 'bla Bla Bla' or null
